pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils
Class DatabaseSearcher

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseSearcher

public class DatabaseSearcher
extends Object

A class that is used to search for various data objects in the database, by sending a specific String containing a search query

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

Constructor Detail

DatabaseSearcher

public DatabaseSearcher()
Method Detail

searchCustomerByString

public static ArrayList<Customer> searchCustomerByString(String searchQuery)
Searches the database and creates a list of Customer instances that match with the search query. It searches by first name, last name and phone number.

Parameters:
searchQuery - A search query consiting of one or more keywords separated by spaces.
Returns:
An ArrayList of Customer instances that may be related/match the entered keywords.

searchDishByString

public static ArrayList<Dish> searchDishByString(String searchQuery)
Returns a list of dishes in the database that are related to the keywords in the search query string, separated by spaces. It searches by price, name and description

Parameters:
searchQuery - A search query consiting of one or more keywords separated by spaces.
Returns:
An ArrayList of Dish instances that may be related/match the entered keywords.

searchExtraByString

public static ArrayList<Extra> searchExtraByString(String searchQuery)
Searches for extras that may be related to the entered search query in the database. Searches by price and name.

Parameters:
searchQuery - A search query consiting of one or more keywords separated by spaces.
Returns:
An ArrayList of Extra instances that may be related/match the entered keywords.

getOrdersByKeywords

public static ArrayList<Order> getOrdersByKeywords(String keywordString,
                                                   String[] orderStatusStringList)
Searches in the database for orders that may be related to the entered keywords. Searches by delivery method, order ID and Order status

Parameters:
keywordString - A search query consiting of one or more keywords separated by spaces.
orderStatusStringList - The required order status('s) that the orders should have.
Returns:
An ArrayList of Order instances that may be related/match the entered keywords.

generateCustomerSearchQuery

private static String generateCustomerSearchQuery(String searchQuery)
Generates a database query that can search for customers

Parameters:
searchQuery - A String containing keywords to search for, separated by spaces.
Returns:
The search query that can be used to search the Customer table of the database.

generateDishSearchQuery

private static String generateDishSearchQuery(String searchQuery)
Generates a dish search query from the entered keywords, that can be used to search the database for dishes

Parameters:
searchQuery - A String containing keywords to search for, separated by spaces.
Returns:
The search query that can be used to search the Dishes table of the database.

generateExtraSearchQuery

private static String generateExtraSearchQuery(String searchQuery)
Generates a database query that will search for extras in the database from the given keyword input string

Parameters:
searchQuery - A String containing keywords to search for, separated by spaces.
Returns:
The search query that can be used to search the Extras table of the database.

generateOrderSearchWhereClause

private static String generateOrderSearchWhereClause(String keywordString,
                                                     String[] orderStatus)
Generates a String query that can be used to search the database for orders, specified by a search query, and a list of order status's that the orders should have

Parameters:
keywordString - A String containing keywords to search for, separated by spaces.
orderStatus - the status that the orders should have.
Returns:
The search query that can be used to search the Orders table of the database.
